title: Exam: Conflict Resolution & Feedback
description: Assessment of diplomatic communication, mediation vocabulary, and mixed conditional accuracy.

items.explanation: Grammatically, 'to meeting' is incorrect. 'To reach a consensus' is the standard phrase for collective agreement.
items.prompt: Which of these phrases correctly describes the goal of ensuring all parties agree on a decision?
If you ________ (not / ignore) the warning signs earlier, the project ________ (be) on track right now.

items.explanation: Accountability is the responsibility to explain or justify actions.
items.prompt: Which term refers to taking responsibility for one's actions and decisions in the workplace?
If she ________ (be) more diplomatic, she ________ (not / offend) the client during the meeting yesterday.

items.explanation: Radical Candor balances direct challenge with personal care.
items.prompt: What is the core principle of 'Radical Candor' in feedback?
